page.title: 13CHANGING SCHOOLS
page.content: I am dreading going to Don Valley high School because I will meet a lot of new teachers and strange people. On the first day everybody who is new will get lost because the school is such a lot bigger than the one we are at now.I will call for my friend and we will catch the bus together. My brother tells me you have some boring subjects and some good subjects.The most boring are sewing,cooking,History,Science and French.The best ones are Art,Maths,Music and Drama.In Don Valley you have to carry your bag with you.If you mess about then you get detention.At the moment you have to wear a uniform but this might change when we start at the school.
